# Text Transform

## Usage

For detailed instructions, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class               | Support        |
| ------------------- | -------------- |
| `uppercase`         | ✅ Full Support |
| `lowercase`         | ✅ Full Support |
| `capitalize`        | ✅ Full Support |
| `normal-case`       | 🌐 Web only    |
